source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact)
- **New Data:** where a Pers_No in the source does not exist as an EmployeeNumber in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Pers_No in source and EmployeeNumber in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'

## View hr_record_fact_new is created

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW hr_record_fact_new 

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT

    CASE
        WHEN T1.Pers_No IS NULL
        THEN T15.HRRecordID
        ELSE NULL
    END as HRRecordID, -- surrogate key
    T2.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID,
    T1.CoCd,
    T1.Company_Code as CompanyCode,
    T3.PersonnelAreaID AS PersonnelAreaID,
    T4.PersonnelSubAreaID AS PersonnelSubAreaID,
    T5.OrganisationUnitID AS OrganisationalUnitID,
    T6.ContractID AS ContractID,
    T7.PayBandID AS PayBandID, -- NULLS occur due to contractors
    T8.CostCenterID AS CostCenterID,
    T9.PositionID AS PositionID,
    T10.ManagerEmployeeID AS ManagerEmployeeID,
    TempMPID.PositionID AS ManagerPositionID,
    T11.LocationID AS LocationID,
    T12.WorkScheduleID AS WorkScheduleID,
    T13.EmployeeGroupID,
    T13b.PayrollAreaID,
    T14.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL as ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T2.EmployeeID,'.'), IFNULL(T3.PersonnelAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T4.PersonnelSubAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T5.OrganisationUnitID, '.'),IFNULL(T6.ContractID, '.'),
                IFNULL(T7.PayBandID, '.'),IFNULL(T8.CostCenterID, '.'),IFNULL(T9.PositionID, '.'),IFNULL(T10.ManagerEmployeeID, '.'),IFNULL(TempMPID.PositionID, '.'),
                 IFNULL(T11.LocationID, '.'),IFNULL(T12.WorkScheduleID, '.'),IFNULL(T13.EmployeeGroupID, '.'),IFNULL(T13b.PayrollAreaID, '.'))) as RowID, 
    'Y' as IsActive, 
    T15.IsActive as HistoricIsActive


FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1 -- COUNT is 997
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.PersNumber AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_area_dim T3 ON T1.PA = T3.PersonnelAreaCode AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim T4 ON T1.PSubArea = T4.PersonnelSubAreaCode AND T1.Personnel_SubArea = T4.Description AND T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_organisation_unit_dim T5 ON T1.Org_unit = T5.OrganisationUnit and
                                                         T1.Organizational_Unit = T5.Description AND T5.IsActive = 'Y' --64 nulls
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_contract_dim T6 ON T1.WorkC = T6.ContractCode AND 
                                                CASE 
                                                        WHEN T1.CT IS NULL
                                                        THEN 'N/A'
                                                        ELSE T1.CT
                                                END = T6.ContractTypeCode AND T6.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_payband_dim T7 ON T1.PS_group = T7.PSGroupCode AND T7.IsActive = 'Y' -- NULLS occur due to contractors
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_costcenter_dim T8 ON T1.Cost_Ctr = T8.CostCenterCode AND T8.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_position_dim T9 ON T1.Position= T9.PositionCode AND T9.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_position_dim TempMPID ON T1.Manager_Position = TempMPID.PositionCode AND TempMPID.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_hr_hierarchy_dim T10 ON T2.EmployeeID = T10.EmployeeID AND T10.IsActive = 'Y' --447 no manager
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_pins_location_dim T11 ON T1.Loc = T11.LocationCode AND T11.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN (
            SELECT T1.EmployeeID, T1.WorkScheduleID
            FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim T1
            INNER JOIN ( SELECT EmployeeID, Max(AbsenceEndDate) as Max_AbsenceEndDate
                         FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim
                         Where IsActive = 'Y'
                         GROUP BY EmployeeID ) T3        ON  T1.EmployeeID = T3.EmployeeID AND
                                                             T1.AbsenceEndDate = T3.Max_AbsenceEndDate
            where IsActive = 'Y'
            GROUP BY T1.EmployeeID, T1.WorkScheduleID
            
    ) T12 ON T2.EmployeeID = T12.EmployeeID  -- NULLS occur as no data for some employees in the absence file, -577 no workscheduleid

LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employeegroup_dim T13 ON T1.EEGrp = T13.EEGrp and T13.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_payroll_area_dim T13b ON T1.PArea = T13b.PayrollAreaCode and T13b.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T14 ON "SAP HR" = T14.Description AND T14.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact T15 ON T1.Pers_No = T15.EmployeeID AND T15.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    (
    -- flags new data        
    CASE
        WHEN T2.EmployeeID = T15.EmployeeID AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T2.EmployeeID,'.'), IFNULL(T3.PersonnelAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T4.PersonnelSubAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T5.OrganisationUnitID, '.'),IFNULL(T6.ContractID, '.'),
            IFNULL(T7.PayBandID, '.'),IFNULL(T8.CostCenterID, '.'),IFNULL(T9.PositionID, '.'),IFNULL(T10.ManagerEmployeeID, '.'),IFNULL(TempMPID.PositionID, '.'),
            IFNULL(T11.LocationID, '.'),IFNULL(T12.WorkScheduleID, '.'),IFNULL(T13.EmployeeGroupID, '.'),IFNULL(T13b.PayrollAreaID, '.'))) <> T15.RowID
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T15.EmployeeID IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y'
    )
    AND T2.EmployeeID IS NOT NULL

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **hr_record_fact_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View hr_record_fact_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW hr_record_fact_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    HRRecordID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID,
    CoCd,
    CompanyCode,
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    OrganisationalUnitID,
    ContractID,
    PayBandID,
    CostCenterID,
    PositionID,
    ManagerEmployeeID,
    ManagerPositionID,
    LocationID,
    WorkScheduleID,
    EmployeeGroupID,
    PayrollAreaID,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From hr_record_fact_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    HRRecordID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID,
    CoCd,
    CompanyCode,
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    OrganisationalUnitID,
    ContractID,
    PayBandID,
    CostCenterID,
    PositionID,
    ManagerEmployeeID,
    ManagerPositionID,
    LocationID,
    WorkScheduleID,
    EmployeeGroupID,
    PayrollAreaID,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact
WHERE EmployeeID IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM hr_record_fact_new WHERE HRRecordID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View hr_record_fact_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table hr_record_fact.employee_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact AS Target
USING hr_record_fact_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.HRRecordID = Target.HRRecordID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(date_sub(Source.IngestionDate,1)),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.hr_record_fact is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EmployeeID NULLS LAST) AS HRRecordID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID,
    CoCd,
    CompanyCode,
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    OrganisationalUnitID,
    ContractID,
    PayBandID,
    CostCenterID,
    PositionID,
    ManagerEmployeeID,
    ManagerPositionID,
    LocationID,
    WorkScheduleID,
    EmployeeGroupID,
    PayrollAreaID,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact;
